dashboard.label: User Permissions
dashboard.description: Azure RBAC role assignments applied to Microsoft Defender EASM workspaces.

search.query: index=security_defender_easm sourcetype=defender:easm:rbac:role_assignment | eval workspace_raw=mvindex(split(scope,"/workspaces/"),1) | eval workspace=mvindex(split(workspace_raw,"/"),0) | lookup defender_easm_role_definitions roleDefinitionId OUTPUT roleName | eval principal=coalesce(principalDisplayName, principalId) | table principal principalType roleName workspace scope assignmentId systemData.createdAt
